name: NSSpeechSynthesizerDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods implemented by delegates of NSSpeechSynthesizer objects.

items.name: func speechSynthesizer(NSSpeechSynthesizer, willSpeakWord: NSRange, of: String)
items.desc: Sent just before a synthesized word is spoken through the sound output device.

items.name: func speechSynthesizer(NSSpeechSynthesizer, willSpeakPhoneme: Int16)
items.desc: Sent just before a synthesized phoneme is spoken through the sound output device.

items.name: func speechSynthesizer(NSSpeechSynthesizer, didEncounterErrorAt: Int, of: String, message: String)
items.desc: Sent to the delegate when a speech synthesizer encounters an error in text being synthesized.

items.name: func speechSynthesizer(NSSpeechSynthesizer, didEncounterSyncMessage: String)
items.desc: Sent to the delegate when a speech synthesizer encounters a synchronization error.

items.name: func speechSynthesizer(NSSpeechSynthesizer, didFinishSpeaking: Bool)
items.desc: Sent when an NSSpeechSynthesizer object finishes speaking through the sound output device.
